devTool.description: Trustless asset transfers and fast cross-chain interactions between ZKsync chains
Fiat-to-crypto onramp via credit cards, Apple Pay and Google Pay for GHO/GRASS
Fiat and cross-chain crypto payments with gas fee abstraction
Google Cloud BigQuery for analyzing on-chain data with SQL queries
Smart accounts with multi-signature logic for improved UX
Comprehensive solution for smart accounts with paymaster and sponsored transactions
Platform for developing, debugging, simulating and monitoring smart contracts
SDK and CLI for creating, deploying and managing smart contracts with minimal configuration
Blockchain interoperability protocol for transferring tokens and messages across chains
